messages.subject: Thoughts??
messages.msgSnippet: (Don t you hate how people who have no kids all seem to be such experts on what parents should do?) Not necessarily!! John Holt was an expert on how
messages.messageBody:
"(Don't you hate how people who
have no kids all seem to be such experts on what parents should do?)"

Not necessarily!!
John Holt was an "expert" on how children learned best and he never
had children of his own.:) I think parents should really listen to
what John Holt shared.

I prefer to weigh ideas and philosophies AND life experience when
choosing to hear an opinion. Some childless people are FAR more
qualified to be around children than many parents.

OTOH, my SIL who is childless is SCARY but has a million opinions
about how people should raise children.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
